title: PERMA banned for this??
body:
Context: draven fed 4 kills. claims he's tylerf**king1. then AFKs
we decided we would like to open mid since it was at around the 10min mark. down 10-0 and a player.

ONE player on the team does not want to give up 4v5..but I'm not even sure this player was actually aware it was a 4v5..


here's my chat log

"Game 1
lFHaley: jebaited
lFHaley: too bad we lose this one
lFHaley: cuz of draven
lFHaley: this fucking mundo
lFHaley: is so trash
lFHaley: i give up
lFHaley: why cant we ff
lFHaley: yet
lFHaley: dravens v 2
lFHaley: can we open
lFHaley: pelase
lFHaley: mids open
lFHaley: ho wis munodo not b5
lFHaley: can we pls open
lFHaley: im the only one trying me and rengar
lFHaley: kleds 8-0
lFHaley: its over boys
lFHaley: just afk
lFHaley: with me
lFHaley: its just a game
lFHaley: olets move on to the next one pls
lFHaley: okaty
lFHaley: mid is open
lFHaley: please end
lFHaley: pease report draven
lFHaley: afk'd start of game
lFHaley: then fed 4 kis
lFHaley: kils
lFHaley: then says in chat he's tyerfucking1
lFHaley: we mutually agreed to open
lFHaley: so idk why you'd report ur getting a free win
lFHaley: yah we give up
lFHaley: do u know what opening is?
lFHaley: ok we will 5 man report u
lFHaley: thx rakkan
lFHaley: learn what opening is please
lFHaley: there's no rulel against that
lFHaley: there's literally a forfeit option"


Only 1 game of chat logs.

If you were just coming off of a 14 day ban then you should have been on your absolute best behavior, instead of calling people trash.

Is this chat log worth a punishment on it's own?  Probably not, but then again you don't really get a permaban off of one game anyway.

Every game of every day ,regardless of ban or not -> I TRY my very very very best.. I tell myself not to argue or to write a lot with ppl, not to rage.. 
and yet, the skilless-ness and stupidity of the players I am getting matched with while its obvious that 4 out of 10 games are versus scripters who clearly uses BoL make me agrovating my lines...

So no.. its not . The matchmaking sucks and frustration rises.

You can blame matchmaking all you want, but I'm sure you know deep down where the solvable problem is, and I wish you luck in solving it.  League is a game, and while it does have a competitive focus when you start getting frustrated instead of having fun you have to make a change.

Full mute could definitely be an option.
No way for Riot to prove someone's age, so why bother.
Your expectations are about your team, which is already the wrong mindset.
Arrogance has nothing to do with it.

Focus on your own play only, and don't queue up for another game if your team's play has tilted you.  You are the only common factor across all of your games, so if you actually focus only on your own mistakes and just let your team do their thing you'll not only have more fun, but you'll improve at a faster rate.

I'll freely admit this is a mindset thing, and some people are simply not capable of ignoring their team's play for very long, which is why if you're one of these people you have to avoid queuing up while tilted.  Tilt is the single most dangerous thing for your own play and has to be given the proper amount of respect.

Never forget that if you're not having fun you're doing it wrong.

if you pla ranekd, you have to focus on your team and play well together.. dont you think? :)

Are you purposely misinterpreting what I'm saying, or am I not making myself clear?

You have to play with your team, and pay attention to their movements and strength in order to plan out what you are going to do.  I'm not saying anything against this.

What you're doing is paying too much attention to their mistakes.  You can't fix their mistakes, yet you're spending an inordinate amount of your time focusing on them.  Spend that time looking at your own mistakes and you'll personally improve, which is the only thing that allows you to climb.

>we decided we would like to open mid since it was at around the 10min mark. down 10-0 and a player.

This is not your decision to make. If the surrender vote does not pass, you do not get to intentionally feed, afk, or otherwise stop playing the game to win.

Furthermore, it takes both time and active play (hundreds of games most likely) to show reform. If you had a recent 14 day ban on the account, or one long ago and many long breaks, that would be why your punishment was escalated to a permanent ban.
I guess I can understand the ban, was extremely frustrated this game. Tried to just get out of it, along with the rest of my team. I didn't edit this chat log, it's an exact copy and paste.
honestly, just dont type to these players. you dont even know them irl and never see them after that game. had to learn it the hard way

If you cant learn after multiple warnings and proceed to flame that hard.. Yes, it was totally deserved.

Incidentally that draven played you like a harp and is probably laughing their ass off.
